validateModel

public void validateModel()
Description copied from interface: BpmnValidator

Specified by:
validateModel in interface BpmnValidator

validateSwimLanes

public void validateSwimLanes()
Description copied from interface: BpmnValidator
Validates SwimLanes of the given model. There needs to be at least one pool which is not a block box pool. Each pool with start/end events (not black box) needs to have at least one lane.

Specified by:
validateSwimLanes in interface BpmnValidator

validateConnectingObjects

public void validateConnectingObjects(Pool pool)
Description copied from interface: BpmnValidator
Validates ConnectingObjects of the given model. All SequenceFlows and MessageFlows are checked for source and destination.

Specified by:
validateConnectingObjects in interface BpmnValidator
Parameters:
pool - pool where objects to validate are located

validateSequenceFlow

private void validateSequenceFlow(FlowObject flowObject,
                                  SequenceFlow[] out,
                                  SequenceFlow sFlow)
Validates a Sequence Flow, checks conditions and if there are multiple flows between two objects.

Parameters:
flowObject - Flow Object which is the source of sFlow
out - array with all outgoing sequence flows form flowObject
sFlow - Sequence Flow to validate

validateFlowObjects

public void validateFlowObjects(Pool pool)
Description copied from interface: BpmnValidator
Validates FlowObjects of the given model. Each Pool with FlowObjects (not black box) needs to have exactly one Event of type StartEvent and one of type EndEvent. This method also searches for unsupported elements like Gateways of type Complex. Cardinalities of all FlowObjects are checked as well, e.g. an activity may have only one incoming and one outgoing SequenceFlow.

Specified by:
validateFlowObjects in interface BpmnValidator
Parameters:
pool - pool where objects to validate are located

validateEvent

private void validateEvent(Event event)
Validates an Event with checks for type and number of allowed incoming/outgoing sequence flows.

Parameters:
event - Event to validate

validateGateway

private void validateGateway(Gateway gateway)
Validates a Gateway with checks for type and number of allowed incoming/outgoing sequence flows.

Parameters:
gateway - gateway to validate

assertNSequenceFlows

private void assertNSequenceFlows(FlowObject flowObject,
                                  int minIn,
                                  int maxIn,
                                  int minOut,
                                  int maxOut)
Throws an exception if the number of incoming/outgoing sequence flows of a FlowObject is not as specified.

Parameters:
flowObject - FlowObject to be checked for SequenceFlows
minIn - minimum number of incoming sequence flows
maxIn - maximum number of incoming sequence flows
minOut - minimum number of outgoing sequence flows
maxOut - maximum number of outgoing sequence flows

validateStartEndEvent

private Event[] validateStartEndEvent(Pool pool)
Returns start and end event of a pool. Also checks if there is one and only one start end end event.

Parameters:
pool - pool where to look for evens
Returns:
array with start event at index 0, end event at index 1
